basic_information.scholarship_name: Department of Mathematics and Statistics Outstanding Student of the Year Scholarship
basic_information.committee_name: CMS - Mathematics and Statistics Scholarship Commi

description: The Department of Mathematics and Statistics Outstanding Student of the Year Scholarship was established by former UCO staff member Sharon Kelting. Sharon created the scholarship to honor her children (UCO Math and Stat alums) and her colleagues. Eligibility Requirements Undergraduate student Minimum of 2.5 GPA Must be a Mathematics and Statistics major Preference to a Junior or Senior Mathematics and Statistics student

qualifying_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
